articles.author: Antonio Pequeño IV
articles.title: Rail Linking India With Europe Announced By Biden, Allies At G20 Summit - Forbes
articles.description: The idea for the project was reportedly developed during talks between the U.S. and the Middle East over the last 18 months.
articles.content: President Joe Biden, India Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other G20 leaders announced at the Summit Saturday plans to construct a massive rail and shipping corridor that would link India with the M… [+2517 chars]
